summary: Completed testing for UI updates iteration 8. All 10 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: Login page shows Admin Portal Access with credentials, Infosys BPM logo in glassy card, Add to Cart button is full-width orange (#FF9900), Submit RFQ button is orange with helper text. New vendor products (Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje) display correctly with CDN images.

minor.issue: Login page displays 'admin@omnisupply.io' but backend expects username 'admin'. Credentials mismatch between UI display and actual backend.

passed_tests: Demo login with demo@infosys.com/demo123/USA works correctly
Admin login with admin/admin123 works correctly
Donaldson products search returns 4+ filtration products with CDN images
Avantor products search returns 4+ laboratory products with CDN images
Markem-Imaje products search returns 4+ industrial coding products with CDN images
Filtration and Industrial Coding categories exist
Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje brands exist in brands list

login_page_admin_credentials.details: Admin Portal Access section displays on left panel with credentials (admin@omnisupply.io / admin123). Note: Backend expects 'admin' not 'admin@omnisupply.io'

infosys_bpm_logo.details: Infosys BPM logo displayed in glassy card (bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm) at top of left panel

add_to_cart_button.details: Full-width orange (#FF9900) button with shopping cart icon, hover effect to #FF6B00

check_stock_button.details: Appears below Add to Cart button as outlined button

submit_rfq_button.details: Amazon orange (#FF9900) button with 'Can't find a product or service?' helper text

donaldson_products.details: 4 Donaldson filtration products: PowerCore Air Filter, Hydraulic Filter, Dust Collector, Fuel Filter Kit - all with CDN images

avantor_products.details: 4 Avantor laboratory products: Reagent Chemicals Kit, Glassware Set, PPE Safety Kit, Chromatography Column Kit - all with CDN images

markem_products.details: 4 Markem-Imaje industrial coding products: 9450 Inkjet Printer, SmartLase Laser Coder, 2200 Print & Apply Labeler, 5800 High-Resolution Inkjet - all with CDN images

brand_colors.details: Product cards display brand badges with correct colors (Donaldson: #003B73, Avantor: #6D2077, Markem-Imaje: #E4002B)

action_items: MINOR: Update backend ADMIN_CREDENTIALS to include 'admin@omnisupply.io' as username to match login page display, OR update login page to show 'admin' instead of 'admin@omnisupply.io'
critical_code_review_comments: NEW_VENDOR_PRODUCTS array correctly added with 12 products (4 Donaldson, 4 Avantor, 4 Markem-Imaje)
MRO_BRANDS updated with new vendors and correct brand colors
Search endpoint correctly combines IT_PRODUCTS_CATALOG + NEW_VENDOR_PRODUCTS
Product images use Emergent CDN URLs (static.prod-images.emergentagent.com)
Add to Cart button styling correctly uses bg-[#FF9900] with w-full class
Submit RFQ button correctly styled with helper text

admin_user.note: Login page shows admin@omnisupply.io but backend expects 'admin'

seed_data_creation: None - used existing demo account and catalog products

mocked_apis.note: These features are placeholders as mentioned in review request

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI updates iteration 8 fully tested. All new vendor products (Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje) working with correct CDN images. Login page shows admin credentials but note the username mismatch (UI shows admin@omnisupply.io, backend expects 'admin'). Add to Cart and Submit RFQ buttons correctly styled with Amazon orange (#FF9900). Use demo@infosys.com/demo123/USA for testing.
